snippet.title: Legionnaires' disease outbreak in Stoke-on-Trent
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Royal Hospital trolley death family queries lack of post-mortem
snippet.description:
Northern Ireland / 2 April 2012
… family. "The death certificate determines the primary cause of death as community acquired pneumonia. We want to know why they changed their minds."
